deleteCurrentUserMessage: Cannot delete currently logged in user.
deleteUsernameExistsMessage: The username does not exist and cannot be deleted.
disabledCurrentUserMessage: The current user cannot be disabled
downgradeCurrentUserLongMessage: Cannot downgrade current user's role. Hence, current user will not be shown.

analytics.title: Do you want make Stirling PDF better?
analytics.paragraph1: Stirling PDF has opt in analytics to help us improve the product. We do not track any personal information or file contents.
analytics.paragraph2: Please consider enabling analytics to help Stirling-PDF grow and to allow us to understand our users better.
analytics.settings: You can change the settings for analytics in the config/settings.yml file

database.title: Database Import/Export
database.info_1: When importing data, it is crucial to ensure the correct structure. If you are unsure of what you are doing, seek advice and support from a professional. An error in the structure can cause application malfunctions, up to and including the complete inability to run the application.
database.info_2: The file name does not matter when uploading. It will be renamed afterward to follow the format backup_user_yyyyMMddHHmm.sql, ensuring a consistent naming convention.
database.fileNullOrEmpty: File must not be null or empty
database.notSupported: This function is not available for your database connection.

session.expired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page and try again.

home.desc: Your locally hosted one-stop-shop for all your PDF needs.

viewPdf.title: View/Edit PDF
viewPdf.desc: View, annotate, draw, add text or images

multiTool.title: PDF Multi Tool
multiTool.desc: Merge, Rotate, Rearrange, Split, and Remove pages

merge.title: Merge
merge.desc: Easily merge multiple PDFs into one.

imageToPdf.title: Image to PDF
imageToPdf.desc: Convert a image (PNG, JPEG, GIF) to PDF.

pdfToImage.title: PDF to Image
pdfToImage.desc: Convert a PDF to a image. (PNG, JPEG, GIF)

addImage.title: Add image
addImage.desc: Adds a image onto a set location on the PDF

watermark.title: Add Watermark
watermark.desc: Add a custom watermark to your PDF document.

permissions.title: Change Permissions
permissions.desc: Change the permissions of your PDF document

removePages.title: Remove
removePages.desc: Delete unwanted pages from your PDF document.

addPassword.title: Add Password
addPassword.desc: Encrypt your PDF document with a password.

removePassword.title: Remove Password
removePassword.desc: Remove password protection from your PDF document.

compressPdfs.title: Compress
compressPdfs.desc: Compress PDFs to reduce their file size.

unlockPDFForms.title: Unlock PDF Forms
unlockPDFForms.desc: Remove read-only property of form fields in a PDF document.

changeMetadata.title: Change Metadata
changeMetadata.desc: Change/Remove/Add metadata from a PDF document

fileToPDF.title: Convert file to PDF
fileToPDF.desc: Convert nearly any file to PDF (DOCX, PNG, XLS, PPT, TXT and more)

ocr.title: OCR / Cleanup scans
ocr.desc: Cleanup scans and detects text from images within a PDF and re-adds it as text.

extractImages.title: Extract Images
extractImages.desc: Extracts all images from a PDF and saves them to zip

pdfToPDFA.title: PDF to PDF/A
pdfToPDFA.desc: Convert PDF to PDF/A for long-term storage

PDFToWord.title: PDF to Word
PDFToWord.desc: Convert PDF to Word formats (DOC, DOCX and ODT)

PDFToPresentation.title: PDF to Presentation
PDFToPresentation.desc: Convert PDF to Presentation formats (PPT, PPTX and ODP)

PDFToText.title: PDF to RTF (Text)
PDFToText.desc: Convert PDF to Text or RTF format

ScannerImageSplit.title: Detect/Split Scanned photos
ScannerImageSplit.desc: Splits multiple photos from within a photo/PDF

sign.title: Sign
sign.desc: Adds signature to PDF by drawing, text or image

flatten.title: Flatten
flatten.desc: Remove all interactive elements and forms from a PDF

repair.title: Repair
repair.desc: Tries to repair a corrupt/broken PDF

removeBlanks.title: Remove Blank pages
removeBlanks.desc: Detects and removes blank pages from a document

removeAnnotations.title: Remove Annotations
removeAnnotations.desc: Removes all comments/annotations from a PDF

compare.title: Compare
compare.desc: Compares and shows the differences between 2 PDF Documents

certSign.title: Sign with Certificate
certSign.desc: Signs a PDF with a Certificate/Key (PEM/P12)

pageLayout.title: Multi-Page Layout
pageLayout.desc: Merge multiple pages of a PDF document into a single page

scalePages.title: Adjust page size/scale
scalePages.desc: Change the size/scale of a page and/or its contents.

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.desc: Run multiple actions on PDFs by defining pipeline scripts

add-page-numbers.title: Add Page Numbers
add-page-numbers.desc: Add Page numbers throughout a document in a set location

auto-rename.title: Auto Rename PDF File
auto-rename.desc: Auto renames a PDF file based on its detected header

adjust-contrast.title: Adjust Colours/Contrast
adjust-contrast.desc: Adjust Contrast, Saturation and Brightness of a PDF

crop.title: Crop PDF
crop.desc: Crop a PDF to reduce its size (maintains text!)

autoSplitPDF.title: Auto Split Pages
autoSplitPDF.desc: Auto Split Scanned PDF with physical scanned page splitter QR Code

sanitizePdf.title: Sanitize
sanitizePdf.desc: Remove scripts and other elements from PDF files

HTMLToPDF.title: HTML to PDF
HTMLToPDF.desc: Converts any HTML file or zip to PDF

MarkdownToPDF.title: Markdown to PDF
MarkdownToPDF.desc: Converts any Markdown file to PDF

getPdfInfo.title: Get ALL Info on PDF
getPdfInfo.desc: Grabs any and all information possible on PDFs

PdfToSinglePage.title: PDF to Single Large Page
PdfToSinglePage.desc: Merges all PDF pages into one large single page

showJS.title: Show Javascript
showJS.desc: Searches and displays any JS injected into a PDF

autoRedact.title: Auto Redact
autoRedact.desc: Auto Redacts(Blacks out) text in a PDF based on input text

redact.title: Manual Redaction
redact.desc: Redacts a PDF based on selected text, drawn shapes and/or selected page(s)

tableExtraxt.title: PDF to CSV
tableExtraxt.desc: Extracts Tables from a PDF converting it to CSV

autoSizeSplitPDF.title: Auto Split by Size/Count
autoSizeSplitPDF.desc: Split a single PDF into multiple documents based on size, page count, or document count

overlay-pdfs.title: Overlay PDFs
overlay-pdfs.desc: Overlays PDFs on-top of another PDF

split-by-sections.title: Split PDF by Sections
split-by-sections.desc: Divide each page of a PDF into smaller horizontal and vertical sections

replaceColorPdf.desc: Replace colour for text and background in PDF and invert full colour of pdf to reduce file size

ocr.title: OCR / Scan Cleanup

selectText.1: Select languages that are to be detected within the PDF (Ones listed are the ones currently detected):
selectText.2: Produce text file containing OCR text alongside the OCR'ed PDF
selectText.3: Correct pages were scanned at a skewed angle by rotating them back into place
selectText.4: Clean page so its less likely that OCR will find text in background noise. (No output change)
selectText.5: Clean page so its less likely that OCR will find text in background noise, maintains cleanup in output.
selectText.6: Ignores pages that have interactive text on them, only OCRs pages that are images
selectText.7: Force OCR, will OCR Every page removing all original text elements
selectText.8: Normal (Will error if PDF contains text)
selectText.11: Remove images after OCR (Removes ALL images, only useful if part of conversion step)

ocr.help: Please read this documentation on how to use this for other languages and/or use not in docker
ocr.credit: This service uses qpdf and Tesseract for OCR.

selectText.2: Sets the minimum absolute angle required for the image to be rotated (default: 10).
selectText.4: Determines the range of colour variation around the estimated background colour (default: 30).
selectText.6: Sets the minimum area threshold for a photo (default: 10000).
selectText.8: Sets the minimum contour area threshold for a photo
selectText.10: Sets the size of the border added and removed to prevent white borders in the output (default: 1).

removeBlanks.title: Remove Blanks
removeBlanks.thresholdDesc: Threshold for determining how white a white pixel must be to be classed as 'White'. 0 = Black, 255 pure white.
removeBlanks.whitePercentDesc: Percent of page that must be 'white' pixels to be removed

certSign.selectCert: Select Your Certificate File (X.509 format, could be .pem or .der):

certSign.selectJKS: Select Your Java Keystore File (.jks or .keystore):

autoSplitPDF.title: Auto Split PDF
autoSplitPDF.description: Print, Insert, Scan, upload, and let us auto-separate your documents. No manual work sorting needed.

selectText.1: Print out some divider sheets from below (Black and white is fine).
selectText.2: Scan all your documents at once by inserting the divider sheet between them.
selectText.3: Upload the single large scanned PDF file and let Stirling PDF handle the rest.
selectText.4: Divider pages are automatically detected and removed, guaranteeing a neat final document.

survey.title: Stirling-PDF Survey
survey.description: Stirling-PDF has no tracking so we want to hear from our users to improve Stirling-PDF!
survey.changes: Stirling-PDF has changed since the last survey! To find out more please check our blog post here:
survey.changes2: With these changes we are getting paid business support and funding
survey.please: Please consider taking our survey to have input on the future of Stirling-PDF!
survey.disabled: (Survey popup will be disabled in following updates but available at foot of page)

meeting.1: If you're using Stirling PDF at work, we'd love to speak to you. We're offering technical support sessions in exchange for a 15 minute user discovery session.
meeting.3: Get help with deployment, integrations, or troubleshooting
meeting.4: Provide direct feedback on performance, edge cases, and feature gaps
meeting.5: Help us refine Stirling PDF for real-world enterprise use
meeting.6: If you're interested, you can book time with our team directly. (English speaking only)
meeting.7: Looking forward to digging into your use cases and making Stirling PDF even better!
meeting.notInterested: Not a business and/or interested in a meeting?

desc.1: This tool splits a PDF file into multiple PDFs based on its chapter structure.
desc.2: Bookmark Level: Choose the level of bookmarks to use for splitting (0 for top-level, 1 for second-level, etc.).
desc.3: Include Metadata: If checked, the original PDF's metadata will be included in each split PDF.
desc.4: Allow Duplicates: If checked, allows multiple bookmarks on the same page to create separate PDFs.

releases.title: Release Notes
releases.note: Release notes are only available in English

description.1: We use cookies and other technologies to make Stirling PDF work better for youhelping us improve our tools and keep building features you'll love.
description.2: If youd rather not, clicking 'No Thanks' will only enable the essential cookies needed to keep things running smoothly.

description.1: Stirling PDF uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and understand how our tools are used. This helps us improve performance, develop the features you care about, and provide ongoing support to our users.
description.2: Stirling PDF cannotand will nevertrack or access the content of the documents you use.
description.3: Your privacy and trust are at the core of what we do.

necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core features like setting your privacy preferences, logging in, and filling out formswhich is why they cant be turned off.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how our tools are being used, so we can focus on building the features our community values most. Rest assuredStirling PDF cannot and will never track the content of the documents you work with.
